## **Introduction to module 2**

# **Learning Outcomes**

At the end of this module participants will be able to:

1.  Apply good practice in learning and training design for pathogen genomics and bioinformatics
2.  Apply outcome-based and [competency](https://lms.wellcomeconnectingscience.org/mod/glossary/showentry.php?eid=86&displayformat=dictionary "Train the Trainer Glossary: Competency") mapping methods for genomics skills development among healthcare professionals
3.  Design training strategies, activities and resources for effective delivery of pathogen genomics training.
4.  Outline a training and delivery plan for a short course in pathogen genomics
